document.full_text: a new microscope that uses an exquisitely thin sheet of light, similar to the ones in bar-code scanners in supermarkets, is allowing researchers to gather three-dimensional images of the insides of living cells in unprecedented detail.
document.title: video: new microscope sees inside living cells
lines_and_colors: a new microscope that uses an exquisitely thin sheet of light, similar to the ones in bar-code scanners in supermarkets, is allowing researchers to gather three-dimensional images of the insides of living cells in unprecedented detail.
